mapper.select:
select pi_image,p_name,p_price,p_content,ps_regdate,ps_expiration ,ps_count,ps_price,ps_state,ps_udate,c1_name,c2_name,p_division,seller.s_num,store.st_num,product.p_num,ps_num
from proimage
inner join product on proimage.pi_num = product.pi_num inner join productsell on product.p_num = productsell.p_num inner join category2dep on product.c2_num = category2dep.c2_num inner join category1dep on category1dep.c1_num = category2dep.c1_num inner join seller on productsell.s_num = seller.s_num inner join store on store.s_num = seller.s_num
WHERE productsell.ps_num =#{ps_num}
SELECT st_num, s_num, st_bnum, st_name, st_address, st_email, st_hours, st_cell, st_ceo, st_lat, st_lon, st_date, si_division FROM store WHERE st_num =#{st_num}
SELECT prv_num, preview.c_num, p_num, prv_date, prv_image, prv_content, prv_scope, c_id FROM preview inner join customer on preview.c_num = customer.c_num WHERE preview.p_num =#{p_num}
SELECT srv_num, sreview.c_num, s_num, srv_date, srv_image, srv_content, srv_scope, c_id FROM sreview inner join customer on sreview.c_num = customer.c_num WHERE sreview.s_num =#{s_num}
SELECT fp_num, c_num, p_num, fp_date FROM favproduct WHERE c_num = #{c_num}
SELECT fs_num, c_num, st_num, fs_date FROM favstore WHERE c_num = #{c_num}
SELECT cart2_num, cart1dep.cart1_num, ps_num, cart2_count, cart1_date, c_num FROM cart2dep inner join cart1dep on cart2dep.cart1_num = cart1dep.cart1_num where c_num=#{c_num}
select count(*) from CART1DEP where c_num = #{c_num}
